Titanium

Titanium

Name:Titanium
Formula:Ti
Atomic Number:22
Group:4
Block:d
Atomic Mass:47.867
Discovery Date:1791
Appearance:A hard, shiny and strong metal.

Uses:

  • Jewellery
  • Laptops
  • Spacecraft
